ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats float on me.
🌊 You can swim in me if you are careful.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and crawl on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I pinch with my claws.
🦀 I walk sideways.
🏖️ You can find me on the sand.

ocean.question: I am a star, but I live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms, sometimes more!
🖐️ I am shaped like a star.
🐠 I live under the sea with the fish.

ocean.question: I am very big and gray, and I sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🌊 I spout water from a hole on my back.
🎶 You can sometimes hear my songs from far away.

ocean.question: I live in a shell and hide when scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very slow.
🏠 My shell is my home.
💧 I live in the ocean and sometimes on land.

ocean.question: I have a long nose and swim in the ocean. I'm always smiling. Who am I?

hints.text: 😃 I make a lot of clicking sounds.
🐬 I am very smart and playful.
🌊 I am a mammal.

ocean.question: I am a home under the sea for many fish and animals, made of colorful things. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am built by tiny creatures.
🐠 Many different kinds of fish live in me.
☀️ I need sunlight to grow.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. Be careful swimming near me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people think I'm scary.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 I am a predator.

ocean.question: I'm a slippery, long animal that lives in the sea, but I'm not a fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have any legs.
🪨 I hide in the rocks.
⚡ I can be electric!

ocean.question: I float in the ocean, and I can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 🎈 I am wobbly and see-through
🌊 I move with the ocean currents.
🩹 Be careful not to touch my tentacles!

food.question: I am yellow and yummy, monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys eat me!
💛 My color is bright!
🍌 I grow in bunches.

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. You can bite right into me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me!
✨ I keep the doctor away!
🌳 I grow on trees!

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies like to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🚜 I grow underground!
🧡 I help you see in the dark!

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a side. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable!
🟢 I am the color of grass!
👪 I live with my family in a long green home

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal!
⚪ I am the color of clouds!
🥛 I make your bones strong!

food.question: I am brown and sweet. You can spread me on bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I sometimes have nuts in me.
🍞 I taste yummy on toast.
🐻 Bears really enjoy me

food.question: I'm a yummy treat that's cold and sweet. You lick me from a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun!
👅 You can get me in many flavors.
❄️ I am kept in the freezer.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches and can be green, red or purple, sometimes without seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can make juice from me.
🖐️ I grow tightly packed together.
🍷 I am a key ingredient in wine

food.question: I am small and round and can be red or yellow. I am a fruit that is a type of berry. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 I am used to flavor many desserts.
❤️ My name is a popular girl's name.
☀️ I am a symbol of summer.

food.question: I am crunchy and often salty, and I come in many different shapes. I'm made from potatoes! What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can find me at fast food restaurants!
🥔 You can use a dipping sauce with me.
🧂 I am a common side with burgers.
